fire_mage_melt.name: Melt (2 Essence)
fire_mage_melt.flavor: With the merest touch, you cause an object to turn into slag or ash.
fire_mage_melt.effect: You heat the target and cause it to combust and melt. If the object is larger than 1 square, then only the square of the object that you touch is destroyed.
fire_mage_melt.other: Spend No Essence: You can use this ability without spending essence. If you do, you must spend 1 uninterrupted minute using the ability while touching the target before its effect occurs.
